titleStmt.title: A trumpet sounded in the ears of persecutors with lowing of oxen and cows, bleating of sheep, neighing of horses, ratlings [sic] of pots, kettles, skillets, dishes and pans taken from innocent people for confessing Christ Jesus, Gods everlasting way out of evil ... / [by] Stephen Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Stephen, 1623-1678.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
